Header: Two new irrigation projects vested with the public
Content: Two new irrigation projects have been vested in the public to solve the drinking water problem of the people living in Kekirawa Madatugama and Pubbogama areas. MP Ishaq Rahuman vested in the public the irrigation scheme. Two water purification plants have been installed with the assistance of Kuwait, under the guidance of President Maithripala Sirisena and Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. The irrigation scheme will provide water to 300 families in the Madatugama area and 400 families in Pubbogama area.
